name: Z-Virus 2022 Remaster
description:
Z-Virus game by Stevie G made in 2004 remastered in 2022

Unofficial fan version of old 80's classic Zarch aka Virus by David Braben

Original game concept Zarch (1987) / Virus (1988)  David Braben

Due to technical limitations maximum selectable resolution is FullHD 1920x1080


Find other games by Stevie G @ https://stevieg.itch.io/

All music by Eric Matyas @ http://soundimage.org/
